USA: Peach Tree War: The war took place.
Taiwan: Ming loyalist Zheng Chenggong declares sovereignty over Chinese citizens in Taiwan
Russia: Russo-Polish War (1654–1667): The Muscovite army captured Vilnius.
Deluge (history): The voivode of Poznań surrendered to the Swedish invaders.
Muscovy negotiated a ceasefire with Poland.
Poland: Signing of the Union of Kėdainiai
Chile: A general insurrection moves for some years the frontier between the Spaniards and the mapuches from the Bío-Bío River north to the Maule River.
